solution_line_template: First find the total number of glass pieces Jerry sweeps up: {green_pieces} green pieces / {green_percent_decimal} = <<{green_pieces}/{green_percent_decimal}={total_pieces}>>{total_pieces} pieces

Then subtract the number of pieces of other colors: {total_pieces} pieces - {amber_pieces} pieces - {green_pieces} pieces = <<{total_pieces}-{amber_pieces}-{green_pieces}={clear_pieces}>>{clear_pieces} pieces
